situation.title: Trips, camping

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Nature trips have an exception to the ban on free movement. However, it is not possible to organize a group trip - the maximum number of people is two unless they are living in the same household (a family trip is therefore allowed). There is no need to wear a face mask there, however, it is mandatory to put it on if you meet other people. Do not forget to return from the trip by 9 PM to not violate the curfew.

Camping is not allowed, as the service of campsites is currently prohibited. Night camping is also not allowed due to the curfew.

questions_answers.question: Can I take my family on a trip to the forest?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but you need to be back by 9 PM.

questions_answers.question: Can I stay out for night camping?
questions_answers.value: No, you would violate the curfew.
